channel.title: jonin ascension
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "jonin ascension" - 500000 XP per day!

item.title: Re: jonin ascension
item.content:encoded:
i made experience with enough appetite and five silver elixers ->this solution was made with my second character.
if your village has ramen shop inclusive cooking school buy that ramen that increase your appetite

item.title: Re: jonin ascension
item.content:encoded: you can buy apertifs in the juice bar to give you extra stamina, get however much you need, you won't get bad effects till the next day.

item.title: Re: jonin ascension
item.content:encoded: What if you don't have enough Appetite to do 4 Silver Elixers?

item.title: Re: jonin ascension
item.content:encoded: would having the pandobear on your team with his 30% jutsu XP help?

item.title: Re: jonin ascension
item.content:encoded: Starting the mission the day before is ideal, if you do not plan on using a hairpin to restore your stamina. If you use the hairpin mission then you would have to abandon the jonin exam.

item.title: Re: jonin ascension
item.content:encoded:
or better yet, start the mission the day before so you don't need to use chakra or change to jonin team. when your on the 'get 500,000 ranking xp' page, stop and change teams to what your going to use the next day (timmy lvl. 2, annie lvl.2, stalkergirl/ pinky lvl.2)

that way you don't waste any stamina changing teams (you need to change to crazy love triangle later, and that uses up your free team change)

it's good if you valentine item (if you have one) is stalkergirls or pinky's, then you get 20 extra xp.

also, it is a good idea to run missions in the stat you are strongest in, since you don't need the ryo and you don't want to fail ANY missions. if you're running tai, use pinky 2 instead of stalkergirl.

also get aura of experience if you can (NWW item) and turn on the flip out theme.

apart from that, use any and all stamina bonuses you possibly can.

item.title: Re: jonin ascension
item.content:encoded:
only wear it down to about 40, if you take time for a little preparation you wont get stuck with a major problem that most season 2+ people forget

Chakra. leave 10 or even 20 stamina to get a little boost, cause remember, jonin ascension requires alot of jutsu use.

item.title: Re: jonin ascension
item.content:encoded: You do not need any special items. The easiest way to do it is to use four Silver Elixir and do two All Out Bash parties. If you do that you do not even have to run a single mission. This way you must have access to Diet Ramen, and save 40,000 ryo. The other way to do it is to use as many Silver Elixir as you can. Three if you have Hollow Leg, or two if you do not. Then you run general B-ranks with a team of Timmy level 2, Annie level 2, and Pinky level 2. When you get down to 30 stamina you sell your blue flower hairpin and do the special mission to get another one and restore your stamina. Use other stamina bonuses that you can get your hands on till you have the 500,000. Remember to save 30 stamina for the jonin exam special mission.

item.title: jonin ascension
item.content:encoded: how can i get 500,000 xp per day to finish the 2nd season jonin ascension? do i need special items?
